adaa.analytics.rules.operator

Class RulePerformanceEvaluator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rapidminer.tools.AbstractObservable<com.rapidminer.operator.Operator>
      • com.rapidminer.operator.Operator
        • com.rapidminer.operator.performance.AbstractPerformanceEvaluator
          • adaa.analytics.rules.operator.RulePerformanceEvaluator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.rapidminer.gui.wizards.ConfigurationListener, com.rapidminer.gui.wizards.PreviewListener, com.rapidminer.operator.annotation.ResourceConsumer, com.rapidminer.operator.learner.CapabilityProvider, com.rapidminer.parameter.ParameterHandler, com.rapidminer.tools.LoggingHandler, com.rapidminer.tools.Observable<com.rapidminer.operator.Operator>

    public class RulePerformanceEvaluator
extends com.rapidminer.operator.performance.AbstractPerformanceEvaluator
    Operator performing evaluation of rule models produced by the RuleGenerator class. It may be used for assessment of classification, regression, and survival rule sets (type of problem is established on the basis of the input set metadata).

      • determineExperimentType

        public static int determineExperimentType(com.rapidminer.example.ExampleSet set)
        Establishes experiment type on the basis of example set.
        Parameters:
        set - Example set to be investigated.
        Returns:
        Integer representing one of the possible types (TYPE_CLASSIFICATION, TYPE_BINARY_CLASSIFICATION, TYPE_REGRESSION, TYPE_SURVIVAL).
